description: Decimal expansion of -log(gamma), where gamma is Euler's constant A001620.
references: W. E. Mansell, Tables of Natural and Common Logarithms. Royal Society Mathematical Tables, Vol. 8, Cambridge Univ. Press, 1964, p. XVIII.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Ivan Panchenko, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
